metadata.title: CVE-2019-15117 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
parse_audio_mixer_unit in sound/usb/mixer.c in the Linux kernel through5.2.9 mishandles a short descriptor, leading to out-of-bounds memoryaccess.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15117` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-9.12
